definition: ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: What is the 20-digit serial code for the original game time card used to activate the account?
sentences.chinese: 最初启动游戏帐号的20位数数字代码是什么？

sentences.english: You can opt to sign up for a specialized dating site.
sentences.chinese: 你可以尝试在一个专门的交友网站注册帐号。

sentences.english: I have done away with my Bloglines account.
sentences.chinese: 我已经扔掉了自己在线阅读器的帐号。

sentences.english: Enter the password for the Administrator account, then re-enter it as confirmation.
sentences.chinese: 输入管理员帐号密码，然后重新输入以便确认。

sentences.english: Fill out the form and follow the instructions to activate your account.
sentences.chinese: 按要求填写表格，并激活自己的帐号。

sentences.english: Your account: xxxxxxxxxx has been successfully created.
sentences.chinese: 表示帐号已经创建成功。

sentences.english: And yes, so does trading personal emails on the company account.
sentences.chinese: 对了，没错，用公司帐号互发私人电子邮件也算。

sentences.english: After 30days of inactivity, your account will be cancelled.
sentences.chinese: 连续30日不活跃的用户帐号将被注销。
这是一个自动更新帐号。

sentences.english: Please put your request of usurp at the end of this page. Thank you.
sentences.chinese: 请将帐号易手的请求置于本段的最底。

sentences.english: I just found someone falsely your account.
sentences.chinese: 我刚发现有人冒用你的帐号。

sentences.english: This function can implement account expiration and access hour restrictions.
sentences.chinese: 这个函数可以实现帐号过期并访问时间限制。

sentences.english: That requires a demo account with a password known to the entire booth staff.
sentences.chinese: 这需要所有展台工作人员都知道的演示帐号和密码。

sentences.english: Please help me, and allow me to get my account back.
sentences.chinese: 请帮助我，让我拿回帐号。

sentences.english: This screen displays credit card information accessed by account number.
sentences.chinese: 这个屏幕显示了按帐号访问的信用卡的信息。

sentences.english: Please login your account to use more service.
sentences.chinese: 使用我们网站的更多服务，请登入您的帐号密码。

definition: online banking/abbr. for 網上銀行|网上银行[wang3 shang4 yin2 hang2]
verification code/CAPTCHA, a type of challenge-response test (computing)
